attributes.action: Campaign to restore the Sea Harriers to the Royal Navy
attributes.additional_details:
The premature retirement of the Royal Navy's Sea Harrier before it's replacement is in service leaves the UK vulnerable in its ability to conduct a Campaign like the Falkand's War in 1982.
An effective strike force of Sea Harriers must be restored to provide an effective fixed wing response to support 'Any' operation and maintain a deterrent effect.
